'''Minecraft: Guide to Ocean Survival''' is a guide that contains various tips on how to explore survive in different [[ocean]] [[biomes]].

== Synopsis ==
{{Quote|Minecraft's oceans are teeming with colorful life and rare treasures, but new dangers lurk beneath the [[water]] and survival can prove difficult.

The official '''''Minecraft: Guide to Ocean Survival''''' will teach you how to breath underwater, find valuable sunken loot and fight off [[guardian]]s and other menacing mobs of the deep.

With insider info and tips from the experts at Mojang, this is the definitive guide to underwater survival.}}
